name: Solium Infernum
storyline: The Prince of Darkness has vanished and the Infernal Throne sits empty. A conclave of the Powers and Potentates of Hell will be summoned to Pandemonium to select the next ruler of The Infernal Pit. Do you have what it takes to claim the throne and rule Hell?
summary: Solium Infernum is a challenging turn based strategy game based on the interaction of many simple concepts set in the profoundest depths of Hell.
